Title: Relates to making grants and tax expenditures accessible to the public
Summary: Relates to directing agencies that provide grants and tax expenditures for the purpose of economic development to make comprehensive information on such grants and tax expenditures accessible to the public on a searchable website.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to directing agencies that provide grants and tax expenditures for the purpose of economic development to make comprehensive information on such grants and tax expenditures accessible to the public on a searchable website
